Class GridCacheSharedManagerAdapter<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class GridCacheSharedManagerAdapter<K,V>
extends Object
implements GridCacheSharedManager<K,V>
